title: CREATE_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER
content:
0x70FA2AFA// CreateTimecycleModifier
int CREATE_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER(char* modifierName);Parameters:modifierName: The new timecycle name, must be unique.Returns: The created timecycle modifier index, or -1 if failed.Create a clean timecycle modifier. See SET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_VAR to add variables.Examples:Lualocal modifierName = "my_awesome_timecycle"
local createdIndex = CreateTimecycleModifier(modifierName)

if createdIndex ~= -1 then
  SetTimecycleModifier(modifierName)
end
codeBlocks:
local modifierName = "my_awesome_timecycle"
local createdIndex = CreateTimecycleModifier(modifierName)

if createdIndex ~= -1 then
  SetTimecycleModifier(modifierName)
end
